item.title: Five Great Ways To Customize Your 5D Mark III | Fstoppers
item.description:
Five Great Ways To Customize Your 5D Mark III | Fstoppers

You finally got that Canon 5D Mark III camera you have been desiring and now you are trying to figure out how best to take advantage of all it's great new features. Here are five ways I have customized my camera to best fit my needs while shooting weddings, events and portraits.

item.title: My 6 Favorite Travel Tips | Fstoppers
item.description:
My 6 Favorite Travel Tips | Fstoppers

As a wedding photographer and workshop instructor I travel quite frequently. In the last couple of years I have been all over the world and throughout this time I have picked up a number of great travel tips. Here are six of my favorites that will hopefully make your next trip more enjoyable.

item.title: Can You Tell The Difference Between a $100 Lens and a $1600 Lens? | Fstoppers
item.description:
Can You Tell The Difference Between a $100 Lens and a $1600 Lens? | Fstoppers

One of the most popular lens lengths on the market is the 50mm. As a Canon shooter I have a few different choices to pick from at that length, but the three most popular seem to be the 50mm 1.8, 50mm 1.4 and 50mm 1.2.

item.title: Simple But Great Tip To Naming Your Photography Folders | Fstoppers
item.description:
Simple But Great Tip To Naming Your Photography Folders | Fstoppers

There is no wrong or right way of naming the folders on your computer. It is really just a matter of preference and what works best in your workflow. Having been doing this for a number of years though I have experimented with quite a few different ways and this is by far the one I like best.

item.title: Download Multiple Cards At Once With This Workflow Solution | Fstoppers
item.description:
Download Multiple Cards At Once With This Workflow Solution | Fstoppers

You've been out shooting for 12 hours, you've got 4 cards full of data, it's midnight, and you have another shoot first thing in the morning. Wouldn't it be nice to have a solution that allows you to pop all those cards in a reader at one time thereby getting your download done 4x faster than if you did it with one card reader.

item.title: How To Size Your Images So They Show Their Best on Facebook | Fstoppers
item.description:
How To Size Your Images So They Show Their Best on Facebook | Fstoppers

Just about every day I read a comment from a photographer complaining about Facebook making their images look terrible. There are hundreds of websites that have done tests and posted results to show what they feel is the best resolution to post your images to Facebook.

item.title: The Best Marketing Dollars I Have Ever Spent On My Business | Fstoppers
item.description:
The Best Marketing Dollars I Have Ever Spent On My Business | Fstoppers

"Trevor, I see that a lot of people are visiting my site, but no one is contacting me for business. What can I do better?" I get this question quite a bit either via email or at the workshops I teach and while there is no magic solution that will work for everyone, I'd love to share what has been the biggest game changer for me in my business.

item.title: 26.5 Tips On Becoming The Perfect Second Shooter | Fstoppers
item.description:
26.5 Tips On Becoming The Perfect Second Shooter | Fstoppers

As a wedding photographer I am always on the hunt for that perfect second shooter. Over the last 4 years I have shot 120+ weddings and worked with over 70 different second shooters. Most of them have been fantastic but I have always thought it would be nice to have a list of second shooter tips I could send them before the wedding day.

item.title: My Favorite New Photography Tool When I Travel | Fstoppers
item.description:
My Favorite New Photography Tool When I Travel | Fstoppers

I have had the privilege of traveling all over the world as a photographer and love shooting photos of locals. They always light up seeing the images of themselves. However, I realized that while they loved seeing the images on the back of my camera, I was missing something important.

item.title: Keyboard Shortcuts Worth Learning for the Crop Tool in Lightroom | Fstoppers
item.description:
Keyboard Shortcuts Worth Learning for the Crop Tool in Lightroom | Fstoppers

I am a keyboard shortcut junkie. Anytime I can find a way to do something quicker using a keyboard shortcut I will force myself to use it for a few days till I have built it into my workflow. A few of my favorite keyboard shortcuts are found in the Lightroom Crop Tool.
